title: 600,000 followers on Twitter: #Thankyou
body:
#Thankyou to all our followers for your interest and interaction! We now have more than 600,000 followers on our English language Twitter channel @DeutscheBank. In the Twittersphere we keep our followers updated about all kinds of Deutsche Bank initiatives relating to the economy, society and financial markets. Interested? Then join us via one or more of our social media channels. We look forward to tweeting with you!
Follow us on:
Twitter
LinkedIn
YouTube
Instagram
Facebook
